newsitem.title: LITHUANIA: HERMIS PROFIT SO FAR IN 1997 8.5 MLN LITAS.
newsitem.headline: HERMIS PROFIT SO FAR IN 1997 8.5 MLN LITAS.

text.p: The chairwoman of Lithuania's Hermis Bank on Thursday said that the profit for the first two and half months of this year was 8.5 million litas and expected the full year figure to be higher than in 1996.
The bank earlier announced an audited 1996 profit of 27.4 million litas.
This compared to a net profit of 3.6 million litas in 1995 under Lithuanian accounting standards but which turned into a loss of eight million litas under international standards.

"The profit will be higher than 1996 since now the result of the two and a half months of this year showed that we have 8.5 million litas net profit," Hermis chairwoman Nadyezhda Novickiene told Reuters.
